input: A Member of Lok Sabha does not become disqualified to continue as a Member of the House if the Member (CDS 2016-I)

options.A: voluntarily gives up his / her membership of the political party from which he /she was elected
options.B: is expelled by the political party from which he / she had been elected to the House
options.C: Joins a political party after being elected as an independent candidate
options.D: abstains from voting contrary to the direction by his / her political party

explanation: An MP elected from a particular party does not become disqualified for a member of a house, when he is expelled by that particular party.
